thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 32 of 2268
thread.title: Reg Felton

author: Reg Felton
title: Reg Felton
text:
At the time of ordering I only needed one blind to cover rear door from kitchen to garden which, whilst being glass and double glazed always felt cold in winters weather.
I contacted Blinds2go and after them sending me the whole range of yellow samples both fabric and colour, I ordered and within days received the full blind which was erected without problems following enclosed instructions. When the time comes for other rooms to be considered I will, without hesitation, tread the same path. R.Felton
